patterns: How can I apply for admission?
What is the admission process?
How do I enroll my child?
Tell me about the admission requirements
What is the age limit for admissions?
responses: To apply for admission, please fill out the application form available on our website or visit the school office during working hours.
Our admissions team will guide you through the process. For further details, please contact the school administration.

patterns: What is the fee structure?
How much are the school fees?
Can you provide details on tuition fees?
Is there a breakdown of fees?
What are the payment options for fees?
responses: Our fee structure varies by grade level. For detailed information, please visit our website or contact the school office.
The fee structure is available upon request. You can also inquire about any available payment plans.

patterns: What are the school timings?
When does school start and end?
What time does the school open?
Can you tell me the school hours?
responses: The school operates from 8:00 AM to 3:00 PM, Monday through Friday.
Our school timings are 8:00 AM to 3:00 PM. Extra-curricular activities may be scheduled after regular school hours.

patterns: What curriculum do you follow?
Tell me about the syllabus
Do you offer CBSE or ICSE?
What are the subjects offered in each grade?
responses: We follow the CBSE curriculum, which provides a well-rounded education to prepare students for various fields.
Our school follows the CBSE curriculum with a focus on core subjects as well as extra-curricular activities.

patterns: Is there school bus service?
Tell me about transportation options
Do you provide transport facilities?
Can my child take the school bus?
responses: Yes, we offer school bus services covering most areas nearby. For routes and availability, please contact the school office.
Our transport facility is available for an additional fee. Please reach out to the administration for more details.

patterns: How can I contact the school?
What is your contact information?
How do I reach the administration?
Please give me the school's phone number
responses: You can contact us at +91-XXXXXXXXXX or email us at info@schoolname.com.
Feel free to call our administration office at +91-XXXXXXXXXX during working hours.
